items.q: What types of bikes do you sell?
items.a: I offer a wide range of bikes including road, mountain, hybrid, and electric bikes to suit all needs and preferences.

items.q: Do you provide bike fitting services?
items.a: Yes, I provide personalized bike fitting to ensure you get the most comfortable and efficient ride possible.

items.q: Can I schedule a test ride?
items.a: Absolutely! Contact me to book a test ride and experience the bike before making a decision.

items.q: Do you offer maintenance or repair services?
items.a: Yes, I offer maintenance and repair services to keep your bike in top condition.

items.q: How can I contact you for a consultation?
items.a: You can reach out via the contact form on my website or call me directly to schedule a free consultation.
